data.comment: The big names in today's match at Hope CBD Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, William Collum, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 11, Scott McMann is booked for the home team.
Ianis Hagi scores to make it 0-1 at Hope CBD Stadium.
Goal! James Tavernier extends Rangers's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 26, Connor Goldson (Rangers) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Charlie Trafford with Jamie Hamilton. This is the first substitution made today by Brian Rice.
Ross Callachan for Hamilton has been booked by William Collum and receives a first yellow card.
At Hope CBD Stadium, Scott McMann has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 77, The home team has substituted Reegan Mimnaugh with Kyle Munro. Brian Rice is thus making his second change.
Scott Arfield is replacing Ianis Hagi for the away team.
The home team replace Marios Ogboe with David Moyo.
In the minute 84, Callum Smith is on a sub for Andy Winter for Hamilton.
Brandon Barker (Rangers) has received a yellow card from William Collum.
That's full-time at Hope CBD Stadium. The final score is 0-2.
Rangers make their second substitution with Greg Stewart replacing Kemar Roofe.
